name: Lake Titicaca
hint: Highest navigable lake in the world, on the Peru-Bolivia border

name: Lake Maracaibo
hint: Large brackish tidal bay in Venezuela, one of the oldest lakes on Earth

name: Lake Poopo
hint: Saline lake in the Bolivian Altiplano that has repeatedly dried up

name: Buenos Aires Lake
hint: Deep glacial lake shared by Argentina and Chile in Patagonia

name: Lago Argentino
hint: Largest freshwater lake in Argentina, in Patagonia near Perito Moreno Glacier

name: Nahuel Huapi
hint: Glacial lake in the Argentine Lake District near Bariloche

name: General Carrera Lake
hint: Second-largest lake in South America, known for its marble caves

name: Lake Rogaguado
hint: Shallow lake in the Bolivian Amazon lowlands

name: Lake Junin
hint: Second-largest lake in Peru, in the central Andes highlands

name: Lago Sarmiento
hint: Lake in Torres del Paine National Park, Chile, known for its blue color
